Package oop.AdministratorLogic

Interface InventoryManagementInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Administrator
public interface InventoryManagementInterface
Interface to define the methods for managing the inventory of medicines. This interface is implemented by classes that provide functionality for adding, updating, viewing, and managing the stock of medicines in the inventory.
Since:
2024-11-09

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addMedicineStock(MedicineStock stock)
    Adds a new medicine stock entry to the inventory.
    void
    deleteMedicineStock(String name)
    Deletes a medicine from the inventory.
    void
    manageInventory()
    Manages the inventory, which includes tasks like updating stock levels, and ensuring the integrity of the inventory system.
    void
    updateLowStockLevel(String name, int newLevel)
    Updates the low stock level for a specific medicine.
    void
    updateMedicineStock(String name, int count, int newPrice)
    Updates the stock information of a particular medicine.
    void
    viewInventory()
    Views the current inventory of medicines.

  • Method Details

    • manageInventory

      void manageInventory()
      Manages the inventory, which includes tasks like updating stock levels, and ensuring the integrity of the inventory system.

    • viewInventory

      void viewInventory()
      Views the current inventory of medicines. This method displays the list of all available medicines along with their stock count.

    • addMedicineStock

      void addMedicineStock(MedicineStock stock)
      Adds a new medicine stock entry to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      stock - The MedicineStock object representing the medicine and its details to be added.

    • updateMedicineStock

      void updateMedicineStock(String name, int count, int newPrice)
      Updates the stock information of a particular medicine.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the medicine whose stock is to be updated.
      count - The new quantity of the medicine in stock.
      newPrice - The new price of the medicine.

    • deleteMedicineStock

      void deleteMedicineStock(String name)
      Deletes a medicine from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the medicine to be deleted from the inventory.

    • updateLowStockLevel

      void updateLowStockLevel(String name, int newLevel)
      Updates the low stock level for a specific medicine.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the medicine whose low stock level is to be updated.
      newLevel - The new low stock level for the medicine.
